## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (MonoDevelop/Xamarin Studio)
*.userprefs

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
build/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# Visual Studio working folder
.vs/

# Autogenerated files
Generated_Code/

# Backup & Crash files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
packages/
*.psmdcp
